item.description:
We're heading back to Springfield to get our fill of funnel cake, cotton candy and deep fried oreos! With appropriate food settling time before hitting the midway.

The Big E runs from Sept 12-28th and we're heading on over opening weekend. Check out the details at: http://www.thebige.co...

Tickets are available online off the above site at a discounted rate of $10, (although with the service charge of $2 it still equals the $12 cost at the gate, but definitely saves the waiting in line).

We'll be meeting to carpool at the Framingham park and ride at 10 a.m., and then drive the estimated hour to Springfield for the fair. Will send out my cell number to my yes's and maybe's and any latecomers can always join us later in the day. I seem to recall that it's about $5 per car for fair parking.

The standby link for the Framingham park and ride is currently down, but details can be found here: http://www.masspike.c.... Will update with a better link when possible.

See y'all then!
item.name: It's the Big E!
